research_municipality_step.notes: The City of Presidio, Texas, operates as a General Law Type A municipality, with a Mayor and five City Council members who are elected at-large. The list of officials is based on the most recent available meeting minutes from October 2025, which provides the most up-to-date information on the Mayor, Mayor Pro-Tem, and City Council members. Earlier sources showed some discrepancies in the Mayor Pro-Tem role and council member names, which were resolved by prioritizing the most recent data.
